review.comment: Great dentist office. Staff was very helpful and friendly. It was clean, modern, and updated. I’m glad this is where our family decided to go for our dentistry needs.

I have never been to a more professional dentist. I was treated with utmost care. I am relived to find such a place that I can trust to give me the smile I want. So friendly and genuinely care. Highly recommend !
Switched recently to this dental practice and couldn't be more happier with my decision to make that change!! :]

Dr. Ryan and Lisa "Fish" were wonderful 😊  I have never had a more wonderful experience.  I suffer from terrible anxiety I take medicine for and they helped me through the whole process. Couldn't have asked for a better team. :-) From Pat and the team that greets you to Vicki who takes your cash 😊.  Best place I have been to in my 59 yrs.
Best dental care around!  Dr. Ryan and his staff are the best at what they do, and they test me like an individual - not just another patient.  I'm glad I made the switch & so will you!

It’s  1 Star. Twice I had to go to the dentist I and I saw that nursing that touch my tooth and did not use gloves  to touch the equipment when the virus is round and the worst one COVID-19 you do not touch someone’s things that he’s going to put on his mouth.
review.review_reply:
Hello love light, I'm terribly sorry we didn't deliver a 5-star experience for you. We are always striving to do better, and our patients' health and safety are top priority! All of our clinical staff is instructed in best safety practices, so if we dropped the ball I want to discuss the issue with you so that it can be rectified. Please call the practice at 616.534.5602 and ask for me, or send an email Attn: Eric to profamilydentistry(at)yahoo.com further detailing the situation.

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Very nice environment! Work done as pain free as possible and efficiently! Dr. Fredrikson is very friendly and so is the rest of the staff. They make you feel comfortable and cared about.
Our family has been going here about a year now. All the staff are so friendly and very welcoming. Wonderful family dentist office.
Awesome dentist, one of the best, everyone is very friendly, great for anyone with dentures everything is done in house

I was frustrated with my previous dentist and was in need of finding someone who was personable, economical and caring.  I was referred, by a friend, to Dr Frederickson.  Dr Frederickson and his staff are amazing, super friendly, take their time, beautiful office, and my kids LOVE going to him (that says enough)!

They are also amazing with my children!  So impressed with this dental office and staff!
Best dentist experience I've ever had! Staff is so welcoming. Hygienist and dentist I had were friendly and professional. Would definitely recommend!!
Lisa and Dr. Aaron were both wonderful.  Took their time. Made sure I was OK.
Evert thing was perfect.  Great dentist office.  Very clean.  Highly recommend
I had a dental emergency that was taken care of quickly and professionally. All of the doctors and staff are amazing.
Good people.  Supper comfortable waiting room but I never have to wait.  Professional, smart, really nice place, highly recommend.

I have extreme anxiety about shots and dental procedures. Ms Lisa and Dr Aaron are absolutely wonderful! They help calm me down and ease the process. They actually turn something awful into a pretty good time. They have a fantastic sense of humor and really make you feel comfortable and cared for. Highly recommend this dental office to everyone. From the awesome ladies at the front desk, the dental hygienist and the doctors. Truly, it's a great place for all your dental needs.

I absolutely love coming here the staff is so welcoming and they do the beast dental work in west Michigan. They are also great with my kids they are always excited to come see Dr.Ryan. The staff is always  willing to answer any questions or concern that we might have and their also bilingual which is a plus !!!

This was my first visit. I was seen within 2 hours of calling, due to a dental emergency. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Facility is spacious and inviting. You will not find a better dental practice. Happy and satisfied!
review.review_reply:
Welcome to the practice, Michael! I'm glad we could work you into the schedule and see to your emergency, and thank you so much for the 5-star review!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Excellent & friendly service. More reasonably priced than my prior dentist.
review.review_reply:
Thank you for the 5-star review, Mike! Glad we delivered top-notch service with a smile for you.

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: If there ever was a dental dream team, this is it. I went there with a mess from my previous  dentist and they worked tirelessly all day to fix it. I wish I had found them years ago. It is not just a job for them, they truly want to do what is best for their clients.  I would highly recommend them!
review.review_reply: Thank you Peggy!

Damon, thanks for the 5-star review!

-Eric, Practice Manager

Thank you for the 5-star review Mary!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Everyone is no nice. The waiting room is beautiful and so cozy.
review.review_reply:
We're glad you felt welcome in our reception area; patient comfortability is important to us, both in and out of our operatories. Thanks for the 5-star review, Dora!

-Eric, Practice Manager

Thank you, Felix, for the 5-star review!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Thankful to have been seen on an emergency  visit. Very nice experience and respect the honesty.
review.review_reply:
Diane, we were happy to accommodate for your emergency dental visit. Integrity is a cornerstone of our practice, and we're glad that was apparent during your time with us; thanks for the 5-star review!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: I had an amazing experience with Dr Ryan.  He explained all my  treatment and is VERY gentle.  His confidence/experience  was calming to me.  The front staff is  friendly and welcoming. They make you feel right at home. Dr Ryan’s Assistant (Lexie)  is  professional and very personable.  I was super nervous and she has a very calming presence.  Lexie also felt very experienced and confident in her job,  thank you all!
review.review_reply:
Thank you so much for the 5-star review, Vicki! We're overjoyed to hear you had an excellent experience with Dr. Ryan and Lexi! I'll be sure to pass along your kind words to them both. :)

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Lexi was awesome! Quick, efficient and kind (even after I threw up on her a little bit). Dr. Ryan is also great!
review.review_reply:
Chelsie, thanks so much for the 5-star review and the kind words for both Dr. Ryan and Lexi! I'll be sure to let them know you appreciated their service.

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: First time there. They got me seen right away and did awsome work with absolutely no probloms. Way better than my last dentist. 5 stars
review.review_reply:
Mitchell, thank you so much for the 5-star review and welcome to our practice!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Very fast and friendly staff that care about their patients
review.review_reply:
Thank you for your business and the review, Chris! Is there anything we could have done better to deliver 5-star service to you?

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: I met Dr. Aaron Dallman today and what I loved about him and Sarah was how patient, kind and accommodating they were. I haven't seen a dentist since I was 10 years old. I was terrified when I came in because I know my teeth need serious attention and care and Dr. Dallman gave me hope.
review.review_reply:
Chrissy, welcome to the practice and thank you so much for the 5-star review! We're so glad you felt welcome and I will pass along your kind words to Dr. Aaron and Sarah. Please don't hesitate to call if you have any questions, and we look forward to helping you with your future dental care needs!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Some of the nicest people ive ever met!!!
review.review_reply:
Thank you, Aaron, for the kind words and the 5-star review! I'm always glad to received positive feedback that our team is treating our patients right!

-Eric, Practice Manager

Thanks so much for the 5-star review, Arnold!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: This office is amazing! I've been going here for years and they take such good care of you, even last minute adjustments! Kimmy always welcomes me back and is so personable and makes you feel so comfortable,  and of course you can't forget Vicki on your way out, another friendly face and great person! Thank you all for all you do there!!
review.review_reply:
Thank you so much Angie, we appreciate that you've continued to entrust us with your dental care over the years and can't thank you enough for the 5-star review! I'll happily pass along your kind words to the team as well :)

-Eric, Practice Manager

Thanks for the 5-star review Amber, we really appreciate it!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment:
A big shout out to DR ARRON DALMAN.
A very caring DR. that has a great sense of humor but will also take his time to make sure you are always comfortable. Very happy with the service and price at Family Dentistry. Jeff Fifelski
review.review_reply:
Thanks for the awesome 5-star review, Jeff! We're always glad to help, and I'll be happy to pass along your kind words to Dr. Aaron and the team!

-Eric, Practice Manager

Ronald, thank you so much for choosing our practice and thank you again for the 5-star review!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service the best I have ever had 😊🌺 the staff is friendly and they make you feel very good. I recommend it 😊

(Original)
Excelente servicio el mejor que he tenido 😊🌺 el personal es amigable y te hacen sentir muy bien. Lo recomiendo 😊
review.review_reply:
Gracias, Maria! We appreciate the 5-star review and recommendation, and we're glad you felt welcome here!

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Great staff.
review.review_reply:
Thanks Richard, we appreciate the kind words and the 5-star review! I happen to think the staff is pretty great here too :)

-Eric, Practice Manager

review.comment: Very professional and the dentist took time to explain to me what the problem may be. Offered solutions that made sense for me.
review.review_reply:
Thank you so much for leaving us a 5-star review, Laura! We always strive to be thorough and compassionate through our dentistry and I'm glad to hear your visit was no exception.

-Eric, Practice Manager
